title: I want to play league but cant
body: I always get server issue (for three weeks now) as soon as i finish putting my password. It doesn't even load "connecting to server" it just goes instantly to "server issue 1,2,3". I use chrome and i'm not sure if that the problem. I've re-downloaded it 9 times and I've cleaned my laptop. I've used internet explorer 9 and it still hasn't been fixed. I have checked the fire wall but that not the issue.  If anyone can help i would appreciate it.

replies.body:
Hey Sharinganka,

That issue sounds like an issue that a few players were experiencing. Here are some steps that should help resolve this:

1. Open Internet Explorer

2. Select 'Internet Options'

3. Navigate to the 'Advanced tab'

4. Scroll down in the window to the security section

5. Uncheck the boxes to disable SSL 2.0 and SSL 3.0

6. Check the boxes to enable TLS 1.0

7. Hit Apply

8. Restart League of Legends

Please reach out to me if you have any other questions!
